page.title: 11JEWISH SHOPS
page.content: Halperns,Habers,Haberstadt, Horwitz and Feingolds are some of the shops that provide essentials for the Jewish community in{Salford}.Halperns and Habers sell{Kosher}(which means sanctioned by the religious authorities)products.Halberstadts provides {Kosher}meat,Horwitz sells religious appurtenances and Falks, which is mainly a bookshop,also sells religious articles.There are also Supermarkets such as State Fayre and Deli-King. Jewish Restaurants are Jehudas, the Farro's Centre and Lapidus although only a minority of the community patronize them. {Kosher}wines play an essential part in Jewish life because the{sabbath}day is sanctified over wine. Most Kosher shops sell wine for this purpose.
